BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Oversight - Workplace Safety in the COVID-19 Era.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Workplace Safety in the COVID-19 Era.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating an informational campaign concerning workers’ rights under the earned safe and sick time act
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating an informational campaign concerning workers’ rights under the earned safe and sick time act.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing a board to review workplace health and safety guidance during the COVID-19 pandemic
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a board to review workplace health and safety guidance during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the dissemination of occupational safety and health information to city employees during a public health emergency
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dissemination of occupational safety and health information to city employees during a public health emergency.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the Governor to sign A8142E/S6266D, the Healthy Terminals Act, which would establish prevailing wage requirements for covered airport workers.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Oversight - Workplace Safety in the COVID-19 Era.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Workplace Safety in the COVID-19 Era.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating an informational campaign concerning workers’ rights under the earned safe and sick time act
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating an informational campaign concerning workers’ rights under the earned safe and sick time act.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing a board to review workplace health and safety guidance during the COVID-19 pandemic
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a board to review workplace health and safety guidance during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the dissemination of occupational safety and health information to city employees during a public health emergency
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dissemination of occupational safety and health information to city employees during a public health emergency.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the Governor to sign A8142E/S6266D, the Healthy Terminals Act, which would establish prevailing wage requirements for covered airport workers.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Levine and Brannan
